overview: Stream57 is an energetic team that believes in the power of the Internet for learning, marketing and entertainment, with offices in New York and London and servers around the globe. StreamLine 2.9, Stream57’s cutting-edge webcast and rich media software suite, brings a new level of interactivity to online video presentations and e-learning. Recently named #745 in the Inc. 5000 list of Fastest Growing Private Companies, Stream57 was founded in 2001 by President Ben Chodor, and has provided software and services for rich media delivery, webcasting, Satellite and e-learning solutions for a wide range of distinguished clients, including several Fortune 1000 corporations, charities, higher education institutions, media, publishers, finanacial and health care organizations
